title: Why man creates
creator_credit: Saul Bass and Associates, Kaiser Aluminium and Chemical Corporation and Saul Bass
brief_description: A series of explorations demonstrating in form and content the nature of the creative process. Discusses the variety, richness and importance of creative vision. Using animation and live action, each segment has its own style and makes its own statement. The episodes are: The Edifice, Fooling Around, The Process, The Judgement, A Parable, A Digression and The Search.
